lyrics:
10 contributorsthanx 4 nothinâ€™ lyricsintro jermaine dupri  mariah carey
uh this is dedicated to all the ladies out there
thats tired of getting played you know
yall know what this is yall know what this is
so so def i aint even gotta say it
and your girl mimi
thanx 4 nothin no no nothin
you were just playing a game mc
ohohohohohohoh oh
ohohohohohohoh oh
thanx 4 nothin
ohohohohohohoh yeah
ohohohohohohoh you know the feeling
you were just playing a game

verse 1 mariah carey  jermaine dupri
i cant even know what to say
ive been hurt ive been played
i cant even know what to say
and im so ashamed
i cant even cry its that deep
you just lie and you cheat
like its nothin nothin

prechorus 1 mariah carey  jermaine dupri
see you said that you loved me too and so i trusted you
but i guess that subconsciously i knew
but i didnt wanna face the truth uh
that i was only being used uhhuh
and you were just frontin
ayy boy thanx 4 nothin say what
see mariah carey liveget tickets as low as 104you might also likechorus mariah carey  jermaine dupri
i never knew enough about you babe
and i guess i only have myself to blame
now im brokenhearted and shattering
but you were just playing a game
nothin nothin anyone could do to convince me babe
i was living in a lie just a masquerade
now i only know that ill never be the same
but you were just playin a game sing with me

postchorus mariah carey  jermaine dupri both
ohohohohohohoh uhhuh
ohohohohohohoh
thanx 4 nothin uhhuh
oh oh oh oh oh oh oh
oh oh oh oh oh uhhuh
you were just playin a game

verse 2 mariah carey  jermaine dupri
every day and every night i stay by the phone uhhuh
never go no place so just in case you call ill be home oh
seems like all i do is think about our pseudo romance
while youre somewhere burnin diesel in the streets havin laughs

prechorus 2 mariah carey  jermaine dupri
somebody say you know what im going through
youve been left with nothin
too much you cant count on one hand uhhuh
sing it three four five six
seven days a week youre drowning in tears oh
he was so insincere
now youre laying up in bed every night singing
ayy boy thanx 4 nothin yup
chorus mariah carey  jermaine dupri
i never knew enough about you babe uhuh
and i guess i only have myself to blame
now im brokenhearted and shattering
but you were just playing a game
no nothin yeah
anyone could do to convince me babe
i was living in a lie just a masquerade
now i only know that ill never be the same
i cant even know what to say
but you were just playing a game

postchorus mariah carey  jermaine dupri both
ohohohohohohoh uhhuh
ohohohohohohoh
so thanx 4 nothin  uh huh
ohohohohohohoh
ohohohohoh
you were just frontiin oh
